description: Kukul Korala Gamage Gamini Premakumara. Vs. Senanayakage Sarath Kumara before Hon. K.M.G.H. Kulatunga, J
parties: Kukul Korala Gamage Gamini Premakumara. Vs. Senanayakage Sarath Kumara
keywords: Murder • Common intention • Circumstantial evidence • Reliability and credibility of witnesses • Distinction between identification and recognition • Dock statement • Section 27 discovery • Grievous hurt
legistation: 1. Penal Code, Section 296 – Punishment for murder. 2. Penal Code, Section 314 – Punishment for causing hurt. 3. Penal Code, Section 316 – Punishment for grievous hurt.
